text: "Hapta Kangjeibung" (, ) is one of the world's oldest polo ground, in Imphal, the metropolis of Manipur, India. Besides being a polo ground, it is also one of the largest venues for festivities and fairs in Northeast India. ==Sources== * http://wikimapia.org/1675347/Hapta-Kangjeibung ==References== Category:Polo in Manipur Category:Polo grounds Category:Imphal
title: Hapta Kangjeibung
